rules_text:
Foreshadow {5}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
Primordial Slime can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
When Primordial Slime dies, you gain 5 life.
notes:
